<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Disarming Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=380) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 147 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Duelist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=58) (Level 8)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Requirements**
You are wielding only a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.

</column>

---

You adopt a fencing stance that improves your control over your weapon. While you are in this stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC when defending against checks to Disarm you. In addition, you can attempt to Disarm creatures up to two sizes larger than you.
